meanings.definition: A person who believes in or supports objectivism.
meanings.sent1: The objectivists gathered to discuss their philosophical beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Many objectivists follow the teachings of Ayn Rand.
meanings.sent3: The objectivists had a party where they only discussed rational self-interest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of objectivists, individualism shines brightly.
meanings.sent5: The objectivists' dedication to reason sets them apart from other groups.

meanings.sent1: We invited the objectivists to join our book club.
meanings.sent2: The objectivists' opinions on capitalism were well-known.
meanings.sent3: At the meeting, the objectivists shared their favorite books.
meanings.sent4: The objectivists' unity made them a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The objectivists' passion for individual rights was inspiring.
